George C. Elbert

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Egbert, Ebert
  2. Foster Name:
  3. Foster Family: Mrs. B. D. Acker
  4. Location of Family: Unknown
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Auburn, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  8. Date of Birth: 1890, NY
  9. Gender: male
  10. Notes: George died fighting in WWI in late 1918 or early 1919.
  11. Source: The Granger (Auburn, NE), 24 June 1898; Evening State Journal (Lincoln, NE), 3 February 1919.
